metadata.name: A Planets' Affair - Pt. 2 - Heliosphere
metadata.description:
"A Planets' Affair" is a conceptual contemporary electro-atonal music project in "eight chapters plus one" about Whale, Wirikik's intergalactic ship, flying through the Universe experiencing new states of consciousness during its journey. 
After the first chapter (A Planets' Affair) in which Whale flew through the Solar System starting from the Sun and reaching the outer edges of the system of planets, the second part narrates the process of crossing the Heliosphere, the electromagnetic field created by the Sun that ideally divides the Solar System from the rest of the Galaxy.

Those who love electronic music, soundscapes, science fiction movie soundtracks, electroacoustic music and contemporary atonal music will surely be impressed.

All of the compositions were created starting from a short piano improvisation played by Whale, which was shredded, stretched and edited to give life to all the parts that make up the EP. 

The cover artwork shows a metaphysical-style AI interpretation of Whale traversing the heliosphere.
